title: Team Blanc - Recruiting Diamond +
body:
Hey Summoners,

Welcome back to League of Legends Ranked Team spotlight featuring Team Blanc
Me and my close friend started this team, freshly made a week ago, and we are looking for dedicated and competitive Diamond + who are willing to fill in our missing roles and to have fun together :)

Roles and IGNs:

Top: Ganked By Senpai
Jungle: Blanc Jordanhkmk
Mid: Blanc Never
Ad Carry: 
Support: Blanc Senpai

Requirements:
Have Skype + Mic
Must name change to our format : Blanc [       ]

If you could please reply with these layout that'd be very convenient for us to pick the most comfortable players that could cooperate with us.

Age:
State:
Rank (All seasons): 
Role:
Top 3 best Champions:
Availability:

replies.body:
Age: 19
State: Melbourne
Rank (All seasons): S2: Bronze S3: Gold S4: Diamond 3 (Peak) Decayed to P2
Role: Jungle, Mid, Adc, Top < In that order
Top 3 best Champions: Nunu, Lee sin, Maokai, Kha'zix, J4, Rengar, Panth, Amumu, Skarner
Availability: Everyday, anytime :)

Age: 13
State: Victoria, Melbourne
Rank (All seasons): S2: Bronze S3: Gold S4: Diamond
Role:Jungle
Top 3 best Champions: Lee Sin, Jarvan IV, Kha'Zix
Availability: Available on weekdays. 3:30-9:00PM. Since holidays are approaching I'll be able to play more. I can play all day weekends if I'm not going out anywhere.
